subject: Testing with Junit
msgSnippet: Hi, I am assigned to test a Java application using Junit. I am new to Junit testing. Any body can help me in suggesting what steps to be followed to test the
messageBody:
Hi,

I am assigned to test a Java application using Junit. I am new to Junit
testing.

Any body can help me in suggesting what steps to be followed to test the
application? Do I need any IDE tool to test the application?

Thanks,
Ram.
